developer.name: PiSpace (@anthonyrhopkins) - Built on Mark Rackley's foundation

longDescription.default: PiCanvas for SharePoint - Organize web parts into flexible tabbed layouts. Upgraded by @anthonyrhopkins, originally created by Mark Rackley.

features.title: PiCanvas Feature
features.description: The feature that activates PiCanvas - infinite possibilities.

features.title: PiCanvas Loader Extension
features.description: Application Customizer that pre-hides connected webparts before PiCanvas moves them into tabs. Eliminates flash of webparts at their original DOM position.
